description: Now that Max Adonis has a taste for cheating on his boyfriend, he has moved on to the great white whale in his life: his older brother-in-law, though he might as well be his daddy-in-law, Tomas Brand (the King of All Muscle Daddies). Max seduces Tomas and gives his mouth and ass to the all-star daddy to pound and use as he desires!
title: Daddy-In-Law Tomas Brand Fucks Max Adonis
